info.name: MyPOSCore API
info.description:
Collection untuk MyPOSCore Backend API - Multi-tenant & Multi-branch POS System

Features:
- Multi-tenancy support dengan tenant code
- Multi-branch per tenant dengan branch code
- JWT authentication (24h expiry)
- User management per branch
- Role-based access control (superadmin, tenantadmin, branchadmin, user)
- Product & Inventory management
- Order & Payment processing
- FAQ & Terms & Conditions management
- Superadmin management panel

Architecture:
- Separate services: RegisterService & LoginService
- Clean architecture with handlers, services, models
- PostgreSQL database with GORM
- Gin web framework

Roles:
- superadmin: Full system access, manage tenants, FAQ & TnC
- tenantadmin: Manage tenant-level resources
- branchadmin: Manage branch-level resources
- user: Regular user access

Public Endpoints:
- /health - Health check
- /dev/tenants - List all tenants (for testing)
- /api/v1/faq - FAQ endpoints (public read access)
- /api/v1/tnc - Terms & Conditions endpoints (public read access)

request.description: Endpoint untuk mengecek status server

response.name: Health Check Success

request.description:
Public endpoint untuk mendapatkan daftar semua tenant aktif. Tidak memerlukan authentication token.

Gunakan endpoint ini untuk:
- Mendapatkan tenant_id untuk testing
- Explorasi data demo tenant
- Development & debugging

response.name: List Tenants Success

request.description:
Public endpoint untuk mendapatkan daftar branch dari tenant tertentu. Tidak memerlukan authentication token.

Ganti :tenant_id dengan ID tenant yang didapat dari endpoint /dev/tenants

Contoh:
- /dev/tenants/17/branches - Branches Warung Makan Sejahtera
- /dev/tenants/18/branches - Branches Fashion Store

request.description: Endpoint untuk registrasi user baru. Memerlukan tenant_code yang valid.

request.description: Endpoint untuk login user. Mengembalikan JWT token yang digunakan untuk autentikasi.

response.name: Login Success

request.description: Endpoint untuk mendapatkan informasi profile user yang sedang login. Memerlukan JWT token di header Authorization.

response.name: Get Profile Success

request.description: Endpoint untuk mengubah password user yang sedang login. Memerlukan JWT token dan old_password yang valid.

response.name: Change Password Success

request.description: Endpoint untuk admin/owner/superadmin mengubah password user lain. Role hierarchy: superadmin > owner > admin > user. User yang melakukan request harus memiliki role lebih tinggi dari target user.

response.name: Admin Change Password Success

query.description: Filter to show only active categories

request.description:
Get list of all product categories for the authenticated tenant. Categories are automatically filtered by tenant_id from JWT token.

Query Parameters:
- active_only (optional): Set to 'true' to show only active categories

request.description:
Get list of unique product categories for the authenticated tenant. Returns distinct category values from products table.

Example Response:
```json
{
  "data": [
    "Makanan Utama",
    "Minuman",
    "Snack & Dessert"
  ]
}
```

response.name: Get Categories Success

query.description: Search keyword in product name, description, or SKU (case-insensitive)

request.description:
Get list of all products for the authenticated tenant. Products are automatically filtered by tenant_id from JWT token.

Query Parameters:
- category (optional): Filter by exact category name
- search (optional): Search keyword in name, description, or SKU (case-insensitive)
- Both filters can be combined

Examples:
- All products: /products
- By category: /products?category=Minuman
- By search: /products?search=ayam
- Combined: /products?category=Makanan%20Utama&search=goreng

request.description:
Create a new order with multiple products. Order will be automatically assigned to tenant and branch from JWT token.

Request body:
- items: Array of products with quantity
  - product_id: ID of product to order
  - quantity: Number of items
- notes: Optional order notes

Response includes:
- Order details with generated order number
- Total amount calculated from product prices
- Order items with product details

request.description:
Get list of all orders for the authenticated tenant and branch. Orders are automatically filtered by tenant_id and branch_id from JWT token.

Returns:
- Array of orders with complete details
- Each order includes all order items
- Orders sorted by creation date (newest first)

Pagination:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- per_page: Items per page (default: 32, max: 100)

Returns pagination metadata

request.description:
Get all payments for a specific order. Replace '3' with actual order ID.

Useful for:
- Viewing payment history for an order
- Checking if order has been paid
- Tracking multiple payments (partial payments)

      "created_by": 1,

      "updated_by_name": null
    }
  ]
}

request.description:
Create payment for an order. Payment amount must be equal to or greater than order total.

Request body:
- order_id: ID of order to pay
- amount: Payment amount (must be >= order total)
- payment_method: Method of payment (cash, card, transfer, qris)
- notes: Optional payment notes

Effect:
- Creates payment record
- Updates order status to 'completed'
- Cannot pay cancelled orders
- Cannot pay already completed orders

Response includes complete payment details for receipt:
- Payment information (ID, amount, method, change)
- Order details (order number, total, items)
- Product details (name, quantity, price, subtotal)
- Cashier and branch information

response.name: Create Payment Success

request.description:
Get list of all payments for the authenticated tenant and branch. Payments are automatically filtered by tenant_id and branch_id from JWT token.

Returns:
- Array of payments with complete details
- Payment status and method
- Sorted by creation date (newest first)

Pagination:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- per_page: Items per page (default: 32, max: 100)

Returns pagination metadata

request.description:
Create a new user for the authenticated tenant. User will be automatically assigned to tenant_id from JWT token.

Validations:
- username: min 3 characters, unique per tenant
- email: valid email format, globally unique
- password: min 6 characters
- role: must be one of: user, branchadmin, tenantadmin
- branch_id: must exist and belong to tenant

request.description:
Public endpoint untuk mendapatkan Terms & Conditions yang aktif. Tidak memerlukan authentication.

Returns:
- The currently active TnC document
- Returns 404 if no active TnC found

response.name: Get Active TnC Success
response.body:
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "Terms and Conditions - MyPOS Core System",
    "content": "# Terms and Conditions for MyPOS Core

## 1. Introduction
Welcome to MyPOS Core, a comprehensive Point of Sale management system. By using this system, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

## 2. Service Description
MyPOS Core provides:
- Multi-tenant POS system management
- Branch and user management
- Product catalog and inventory tracking
- Order processing and payment management
- Reporting and analytics

## 3. User Responsibilities
Users are responsible for:
- Maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials
- All activities conducted under their account
- Ensuring accurate data entry
- Complying with applicable laws and regulations

## 4. Data Privacy
We are committed to protecting your data:
- All transactions are encrypted
- Personal information is stored securely
- We do not share your data with third parties without consent
- Regular backups are performed to prevent data loss

## 5. Payment Terms
- Payment processing fees may apply
- All prices are in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR)
- Refunds are subject to our refund policy
- Subscription fees are non-refundable

Last Updated: December 2025",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "is_active": true,
    "created_at": "2025-12-25T10:00:00+07:00",
    "updated_at": "2025-12-25T10:00:00+07:00",
    "created_by": 1,
    "created_by_name": "Super Admin",
    "updated_by": null,
    "updated_by_name": null
  }
}

request.description:
Create a new 6-digit PIN for the authenticated user. PIN must be exactly 6 numeric digits and match confirm_pin.

Validations:
- PIN must be exactly 6 digits
- PIN must be numeric only
- PIN and confirm_pin must match
- User must not have an existing PIN

response.name: Create PIN Success

request.description:
Change existing PIN for the authenticated user. Requires old PIN for verification.

Validations:
- All PINs must be exactly 6 digits
- All PINs must be numeric only
- Old PIN must be correct
- New PIN and confirm_pin must match
- New PIN must be different from old PIN
- User must have an existing PIN

response.name: Change PIN Success

request.description: Check whether the authenticated user has set a PIN or not. Useful to determine if user should create or change PIN.

response.name: Check PIN - Has PIN
Check PIN - No PIN

request.description:
Endpoint untuk admin/owner/superadmin mengubah PIN user lain. Role hierarchy: superadmin > owner > admin > user. User yang melakukan request harus memiliki role lebih tinggi dari target user.

Validations:
- PIN must be exactly 6 digits
- PIN must be numeric only
- PIN and confirm_pin must match
- Admin role must be higher than target user role
- Tenant isolation for non-superadmin
- Branch isolation for owner

response.name: Admin Change PIN Success
Admin Change PIN - PIN Mismatch
Admin Change PIN - Insufficient Permission

response.name: Get Audit Trail Success

request.description:
Get complete audit history for a specific entity. Shows all changes made to this entity over time.

Supported entity types:
- user
- product
- order
- payment
- category
- faq
- tnc

response.name: Get Entity History Success

request.description: Get complete activity log for a specific user. Shows all actions performed by this user across all entities.

response.name: Get User Activity Success
